Text: We collect and use your personal information to provide and improve our Services, to protect the security and integrity of our Services and to comply with our legal obligation
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We share your information with other affiliates, trusted partners and service providers to provide and improve our Services, for security purposes, to understand how you use and interact with our Services, and to meet our legal obligations
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Information You Provide to Us\n\nIn the course of providing the Services, we receive several types of information that directly or indirectly relates to you (which we call your “personal information”) in different ways from you. You may provide information to us when you set up an account, make a purchase, chat with our customer support bot or agents, message Members, participate in promotions, or respond to research, or otherwise use the Services.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
Buyer Details: Your name, email address, and phone number
Buyer Payment Information: Your billing address and payment information (e.g., credit or debit card details or other payment credentials, like PayPal)
Delivery Information: Your delivery address, contact name, and phone number
Regional Information: Your country, default language, and currency
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Seller Details: Your name, valid identification, email address, country of residence, phone number, date of birth, taxpayer address, and Reverb shop name
Seller Payment Information: Your bank country, bank account details, billing address and other payment information (e.g., credit or debit card details or PayPal credentials)
Shop Preferences: Your preferred language, country, and currency
Business/Tax Information: Your tax and government-issued identification numbers, tax address, business registration number; copies of related documentation
Regional Information: Your country, preferred language, and currency
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Name
Location and/or business address (if applicable)
Your shop name, shop banner, shop description, shop location, shop links
Your favorite items and favorite stores
Linked third-party accounts (e.g., social media, “sign-in with”)
Product reviews
Registry information (e.g., name, partner name, wedding or special event date, shipping information)
Vacation mode announcements
Linked third-party accounts (e.g., social, “sign-in with”)
Shop policies (e.g., returns)
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Your name
Email address
Billing name and address
Credit or debit card information or other payment method
Shipping name and address
Transaction Information: When you buy or sell goods on Reverb, we collect information about the order as part of your transaction history.
Information about the transactions made on our Services, such as the shop name, items purchased, Buyer’s name, purchase price, and date of the transaction
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Buyer Account Information: We collect certain information from you when you set up a Reverb Buyer account and use the Services.
Buyer Details: Your name, email address, and phone number
Buyer Payment Information: Your billing address and payment information (e.g., credit or debit card details or other payment credentials, like PayPal)
Delivery Information: Your delivery address, contact name, and phone number
Regional Information: Your country, default language, and currency
Seller Account Information: We collect certain information from you when you set up a Reverb Seller account and use the Services.
Seller Details: Your name, valid identification, email address, country of residence, phone number, date of birth, taxpayer address, and Reverb shop name
Seller Payment Information: Your bank country, bank account details, billing address and other payment information (e.g., credit or debit card details or PayPal credentials)
Shop Preferences: Your preferred language, country, and currency
Business/Tax Information: Your tax and government-issued identification numbers, tax address, business registration number; copies of related documentation
Regional Information: Your country, preferred language, and currency
Member Public Profile Information: As a Member on Reverb, you can choose to provide your name and other personal information in connection with your account and activity. Other people will be able to see your profile information. You can edit, remove or limit this information through your account settings.
Name
Location and/or business address (if applicable)
Your shop name, shop banner, shop description, shop location, shop links
Your favorite items and favorite stores
Linked third-party accounts (e.g., social media, “sign-in with”)
Product reviews
Registry information (e.g., name, partner name, wedding or special event date, shipping information)
Vacation mode announcements
Linked third-party accounts (e.g., social, “sign-in with”)
Shop policies (e.g., returns)
Guest Checkout Information: You can purchase goods on Reverb without an account through our ‘Guest Checkout’ feature. We need certain information about you to facilitate your purchase.
Your name
Email address
Billing name and address
Credit or debit card information or other payment method
Shipping name and address
Transaction Information: When you buy or sell goods on Reverb, we collect information about the order as part of your transaction history.
Information about the transactions made on our Services, such as the shop name, items purchased, Buyer’s name, purchase price, and date of the transaction
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
Promotion Information: From time to time, Reverb runs promotional offers, contests and sweepstakes. The types of information we collect will be governed by the terms of the relevant promotion. However, in general, we will collect the email address and/or social handle (if social promotion) for the entrants.
Customer Support Information: We collect certain information when you engage with our customer support and marketplace integrity teams.
Your communications with our chatbot and support agents, including chat, messages, email, and phone
Any additional information you provide, including transaction information (e.g., order or transaction number or ID), and/or device and technical information (e.g., IP address for troubleshooting)
Survey Responses and Market Research: You may choose to provide certain information in connection with surveys, research and other feedback mechanisms.
Business and selling information
Any additional information you may provide
We may, but generally do not, request demographic information, which may include your age, gender, work status, region and neighborhood type (e.g., rural, suburban, or urban) and, if you are located in the US, your income, education and race/ethnicity
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
. Information We Collect About You

In the course of providing the Services, we collect several types of personal information in different ways and from different sources.

Information from our Payment Processors: We receive certain information about Buyers from our third-party payment processors, such as Paypal, who help us to process transactions, provide our Services and prevent fraudulent or illegal activity.
Your first and last name
Your billing address
Your email address
Your phone number
Information from Advertising and Marketing Partners: We receive certain information about you from our advertising and marketing partners, including in some instances what marketing content you viewed or clicked the actions you take on our Sites and Apps. This information helps us determine how our marketing campaigns and other customer interactions may contribute to sales, conversions, or other goals.
We may receive from our third-party partners (or may collect directly), for example, attribution information via cookies and UTM tags in URLs to help us determine the source of the traffic to Reverb or track the performance of a specific campaign
We may also receive responses to marketing emails and advertisements, responses to offers, and audience information from partners who you have given consent to share that information with us
Analytics Information: We use data analytics software to ensure Site and App functionality and to improve the Services
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
We use third-party software to record information such as how often you use the Site and/or Apps, what happens within the Apps or on our Site (e.g., how you interact with our Services), aggregated usage, performance data, app errors and debugging information
Third-Party Application Information: We receive certain information when you engage with third-party applications or platform integrations on other sites and apps.
When you link our Services with third-party applications or integrations (e.g., linked third-party accounts), we receive your contact information, including your name and email address, and any additional information you authorize the third party to share with us (for example, social media accounts and/or sign-in functionality)
Non-Member Information: Reverb receives or obtains information about a person who is not yet a registered Reverb Member in connection with certain Reverb features, such as when a Member invites a Non-Member to visit the Site, a Member uploads Non-Member information to send a gift, when a Member sends a gift card code to a Non-Member, and when a friend enters a Non-Member into a sweepstakes.
Non-Member email address
Non-Member IP address
Non-Member physical postal address
Non-Member social media username
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Information We Collect Through Automatic Data Collection Technologies\n\nWhen you use our Services (even if you do not have a Reverb account), we may use automatic data collection technologies, including cookies, to help us improve our Services and to deliver a better and more personalized experience. Some of the information described in this Section does not alone constitute personal information, but we may link this information to your personal information that we collect from other sources or you provide to us for use of the Services. These technologies include non-technically necessary cookies and similar technologies
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
Information Category	Description of Information Collected
Browser and Device Information
Reverb automatically receives and records information from your browser or your mobile device when you visit the Site, use the Apps, or otherwise install, access or use certain features of the Services.	
Browser and device information, including your IP address, device type, hardware model, operating system information, unique device identifier, and your detected language
App information, including app version, app usage and debugging information, and app ID
Service Usage Information
We collect certain information about your use of the Services, such as how often you use the Apps, how you interact with the Services, and actions you take when interacting with the Site and Apps, in order to help us ensure the Services are functioning correctly, tailor your experience, and improve our offerings. We may collect this information from a subset of users when testing new products or features.	
Usage Information: Information about your interaction with our Sites and Apps, including how often you use the Sites and/or Apps, what happens within the Sites and/or Apps, what listings you view and interact with, or other actions you take (such as clicking on particular parts of the Site or Apps)
Diagnostic and Troubleshooting Information: Information about how our Services are performing when you use them, like service-related diagnostic and performance information, including timestamps, crash data, website performance logs and error messages or reports
General Location Information
We use your general location information for things like tailoring our Services to your location and to estimate shipping costs. See Section 2 for further details on how we use this information.	
IP addresses and other information like your zip or postal code, to estimate your general location (e.g., country, state, or city)
The general location you set in your regional preferences on the Site or Apps
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Where necessary to perform our contract with you: We use certain information that is necessary for us to provide you with the Services and perform our Terms of Use or other relevant contract(s) with you.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Where necessary for our legitimate interest: We rely on our legitimate interests or those of third parties (like other Buyers and Sellers, and in some cases, the general public) where they are not outweighed by your rights and freedoms.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
To understand how our Services are being used, and to explore and unlock ways to develop and grow our business.
To improve the efficiency of our Services, troubleshoot errors with our Services, increase interest in our Services, and obtain insights into usage patterns of our Services.
To provide and customize our Services, including identifying products that our Buyers would be most interested in, to notify you about changes to our features, policies, and Services.
To help Sellers reach the most appropriate audience for their goods.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: To help Sellers reach the most appropriate audience for their goods.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: To enforce our Terms of Use and associated policies, including to prevent or address fraud and other illegal activities.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: To share information with third parties, including as part of investigations or regulatory inquiries, to detect, investigate and prosecute illegal activity or to prevent death or imminent bodily harm.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: To enable business transactions that may be necessary and in our legitimate interests, particularly our interest in making decisions that enable our business to develop over the long term.\nWhere necessary to comply with our legal obligation
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
To provide on-platform advertising on our Sites and Apps
Sellers can purchase paid advertising on Reverb (“Reverb Bump”). Reverb Bump display a Seller's listings or shops prominently on the Sites and/or Apps (and are marked as ads). Reverb Bump are displayed in one or more locations, such as Members’ and Guests’ search results.

Text:
To keep our Services safe and secure
We collect and store your information and, in some cases, apply automated processing and manual review to maintain the security and integrity of our Services. This involves taking steps to detect, investigate and otherwise protect our community against spam, abuse, harassment, intellectual property infringement, crime, suspected fraud, harm, suspected violations of Reverb’s Terms of Use and safety and security risks of all kinds.

Text:
To protect our legal rights
Reverb may also retain, preserve or review your personal information to protect, establish, or exercise our legal rights or defend against impending or asserted legal claims, including to collect a debt or address a violation of our Terms of Useand policies (including our Intellectual Property Policy).
For example, in accordance with our existing case resolution process, we may use information you provide to resolve disputes with Reverb or other Users.

To share information with law enforcement and respond to legal requests
We may share your information with a third party, including law enforcement authorities, where not compelled by law when we believe in good faith that such use and/or disclosure is reasonably necessary to detect, prevent or prosecute illegal activity or to prevent imminent death or imminent bodily harm.
The categories of information that we access, preserve, use and share for these purposes will depend on the specific circumstances.

Text:
In the event of a business reorganization
In some cases, Reverb may choose to reorganize its business. In these types of transactions (such as a sale, merger, liquidation, receivership, reorganization, or transfer of all or substantially all of Reverb’s assets), Member information is typically one of the business assets that is transferred.

In the event of a business reorganization
In some cases, Reverb may choose to reorganize its business. In these types of transactions (such as a sale, merger, liquidation, receivership, reorganization, or transfer of all or substantially all of Reverb’s assets), Member information is typically one of the business assets that is transferred.	
Member Public Profile Information
Buyer Account Information
Seller Account Information
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Reverb Group Companies: We may share some of the information that we collect, such as Buyer Account Information, Seller Account Information, Service Usage Information, Device and Browser Information, and Cookie Information, with our corporate affiliates, including Etsy, Inc. and its subsidiaries. The information shared among Reverb affiliates may be used for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy and generally to operate our business, including for ID verification purposes, transaction monitoring and payment processing or to provide customer support, facilitate business development, administer user accounts or provide IT, technical and engineering support.\nSellers: We may share aggregated information about your use of the Services to Sellers, so they can provide you with better service and so we can improve our Site and Apps.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Business Partners: Reverb works closely with a number of business partners, such as our shipping, and payment partners, that assist us with providing the Services in accordance with our Terms of Use. When one of these companies assists us in facilitating your transaction, we, or they, may need to share information related to the transaction in order to complete your order.
Professional Advisors, Industry Partners, Authorities and Regulators: We share your information described in Section 3 with our advisors and consultants, regulators and tax authorities, law enforcement, government agencies, civil litigants, and industry partners (for example, trade groups) to:
comply with applicable law or regulations, court orders, subpoenas, legal process or government requests;
detect, investigate, prevent, or address actual or suspected fraud, violations of Reverb’s Terms of Use, and other illegal activity or security and technical issues; and/or
protect the rights, property and safety of our Members, Reverb and the Reverb Group Companies, or others, including to prevent death or imminent bodily harm.
Business Reorganization: In some cases, Reverb may choose to reorganize its business. In these types of transactions (such as a sale, merger, liquidation, receivership, or transfer of all or substantially all of Reverb’s assets), Member information is typically one of the business assets that is transferred
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Service Providers: Reverb also engages third-party companies and individuals (such as research companies, analytics services, and security providers) to help us operate, provide, and advertise the Services. These third parties have limited access to your information, may use your information only to perform these tasks on our behalf, and are prohibited from disclosing or using your information for other purposes. The types of third-party service providers that we work with include research companies, analytics providers, security providers, software service providers, infrastructure and technical service providers, professional service providers, and customer or other outsourced service providers. The information we share may include Member Public Profile Information, Buyer Account Information, Seller Account Information, Guest Checkout Information, Transaction Information, General Location Information, Photos and Videos, Customer Support Information, Messages Information, Browser and Device Information, Service Usage Information, Survey Responses and Market Research, and Analytics Information.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Third-Party Use of Cookies and Other Tracking Technologies\n\nSome content or applications, including advertisements, on the Website or through our Services are served by third-parties, including advertisers, ad networks and servers, content providers, and application providers. These third parties may use cookies alone or in conjunction with web beacons or other tracking technologies to collect information about you when you use our website. The information they collect may be associated with your personal information or they may collect information, including personal information, about your online activities over time and across different websites and other online services. They may use this information to provide you with interest-based (behavioral) advertising or other targeted content.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Changes to Our Privacy Policy\n\nWe may amend this Policy at our discretion from time to time. If we believe that the changes are material, we’ll let you know by posting the changes through the Services and sending you an email or message about the changes. Your continued use of our Services after we make changes is deemed to be acceptance of those changes. You are responsible for ensuring we have an up-to-date, active and deliverable email address for you, and for periodically visiting our Website and this Policy to check for any changes.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: Right to Know. You can request the following information about how we have collected and used your personal information during the last 12 months: The categories of personal information that we have collected; the categories of sources from which we collected personal information; our business or commercial purpose for collecting and/or selling personal information; the categories of third parties with which we share personal information; the categories of personal information that we “sold” (as defined in the State Privacy Laws, as applicable) or disclosed for a business purpose; and the categories of third parties to whom the personal information was sold or disclosed for a business purpose.

Text: You can opt out of the sale or sharing of personal information for interest-based ads, and related tracking, by clicking the “Privacy Settings” link (or for California residents, the “Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Info” link) at the footer of our homepage or through your account privacy settings.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: We will not discriminate against you for exercising any of these rights. We will not discriminate against you for exercising any of your rights. This means, for example, we won’t deny you goods or services, provide you with a different level or quality of services, or charge you different prices or rates for services.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text:
Notice of Collection and Use of Personal Information

We may collect and may have collected during the 12-month period prior to the Last Updated date of this California Notice the following categories of personal information about you:

Identifiers: information that identifies you, including your legal name, email address, unique personal identifiers (such as a device identifier and/or IP address), email address, account name (e.g. shop name), government issued ID numbers (e.g. drivers license) which we may use to verify your identity when we onboard you as a seller; and/or tax identification number when setting up your account to sell on Reverb;
Other Records: such as phone number, billing address, or credit or debit card information, and any other personal information covered by Cal. Civ. Code §1798.80(e) (which may overlap with other categories listed here);
Demographic Information: such as your age or gender, or, where you have provided such information to Reverb voluntarily, demographic information about your race, ethnicity, sexual orientation, or gender identity, provided in relation market research or surveys we conduct. This category includes information that may qualify as protected classifications under other California or federal laws.
Commercial Information: including purchases, products sold, and/or your interaction with the Services.
Internet or other Network activity: information including your interactions with our Services and what led you to our Services (including traffic related information) ; device type and/or identifier, operating system and version, browser type and settings and cookie-related data (e.g. cookie ID).
Sensory Information: data categorized as visual data, such as pictures or videos posted on our Service.
Location Data: your general location provided through location enabled services.
Inferences: inferences based on personal data about you, including your interests, watches, and favorites; inferred information about your demographic category used to create marketing segments or profiles.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
The Sources and Purposes for Our Collection

We collect the categories of personal information described in this California Notice from the sources described in Sections 3-5 of our Privacy Policy (Information We Collect About You, Information You Provide to Us, and Information We Collect Through Automatic Data Collection Technologies), which includes collecting information directly from you, your devices, and our partners. The categories of sources include the following: you, Reverb Members, advertising networks, service providers (including internet service providers), social networks, government entities or other public sources, marketing and business partners, and our vendors and suppliers.

We use these categories of personal information for our business and commercial purposes as described throughout the Reverb Privacy Policies, including for the following purposes: providing the Services, processing orders and transactions, internal business analytics, tailoring and personalizing the Services to you, for advertising and marketing purposes; undertaking activities to verify or maintain the quality, integrity, and safety of our Services and to improve, upgrade, or enhance them; maintaining or servicing accounts, providing customer service, verifying customer information, processing payments, and providing analytics services. We do not collect or process sensitive personal information for purposes of inferring characteristics about consumers.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
. Disclosure of Personal Information for a Business Purpose

We share personal information with service providers, contractors, and other third parties. The following lists the categories of personal information that have been disclosed (and may have been disclosed during the last 12-months) for a business purpose and the categories of recipients who have received this personal information. Please note that not every one of the following categories may apply to your personal information. Categories of personal information include Identifiers, other records, commercial information, Internet or other electronic network activity information, geolocation information, sensory information, and inferences derived from personal information. The categories of third parties include our corporate affiliates, our buyers and sellers, our vendors and other service providers, professional service firms (like our auditors or law firms), our marketing and business partners, online advertising services, analytics providers, social networks, internet service providers, and government entities.

In addition to the categories of third parties identified above, during the past 12 months,we may have disclosed personal information about you to government entities for the purposes listed in our Privacy Policy, and third parties in connection with corporate transactions, such as mergers, acquisitions or divestitures.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed
